channel.title: Sannin Mission
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Sannin Mission"

item.title: Re: Sannin Mission
item.content:encoded: Back in April, there was no such thing as ranking XP. It was just jutsu XP.

item.title: Re: Sannin Mission
item.content:encoded: @Uzuki - I am a newbie but doesn't Pandabear gives you +30% Jutsu XP rather than +30 XP Ranking?

item.title: Re: Sannin Mission
item.content:encoded: Well, we're currently still open to temporary members, as long as you've already finished the mission up to the part where you require the Monument. Just make sure you actually tell me first, and mention it in your application message. Otherwise, I'll assume you're a regular applicant and deny the application.

item.title: Re: Sannin Mission
item.content:encoded: Using Anonymous's jutsu gives +50% XP. Note Rush gives another +20% I think. Doing the A-Ranks with Timmy2 and Pandabear gives another +20% and +30% respectively. RedEye, if you have it, would give another +27%. All those help a ton in getting the most out of your stamina.

item.title: Re: Sannin Mission
item.content:encoded:
Is that an open invitation for Imaginary? I've been pondering the run for Sannin but need to find a village obviously. But ultimately you can attempt the run, and then just pause at the "You must be from a great Village - one recognized not for a single action, but for withstanding the test of time." portion to switch to a village with an epic?

Also, for anyone that's managed it. I've calculated the amount of stamina I can get through all bonuses at somewhere around 140 missions at about 5000 XP a piece (A-rank) so that's about 700k xp. Then you have the 2 silver potions for 200k, and partying for additional bonuses. What else should you do to break that 2 million mark?

Thanks!

item.title: Re: Sannin Mission
item.content:encoded: Imaginary has an Epic Monument. We're not looking for new members, but you can borrow our free slot for a day to complete the quest. You did finish the mission up to the point where you needed the Monument, right?

item.title: Sannin Mission
item.content:encoded:
I hit Top 3 today, so I've updated the Sannin page. Could someone more wiki-inclined clean it up for me?

I didn't have Snakeman, so I had to jump ship on my villageâ€¦ (as my alt, not as my Wiki-Village member) anyone know any villages that have an epic monument looking for a Sannin? =D
